title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid email and password, receiving a JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify login is successful and a JWT token is received.

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect email or password and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter an invalid email or password.
Attempt to log in.
Verify login fails and error message is displayed.

title: Create New Partner Record
description: Verify that a user can create a new partner (supplier, buyer, investor, etc.) with all required fields.

steps.description: Navigate to the partners management page.
Click create new partner.
Fill in valid partner details including name, type, CPF/CNPJ, email, and phone.
Submit the new partner form.
Verify the partner is created and appears in the partners list.

title: Create Partner with Missing Required Fields
description: Verify the system prevents creation of a partner when required fields are missing and displays validation errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the partners management page.
Attempt to create a new partner with missing required fields.
Submit the new partner form.
Verify validation errors are displayed and partner is not created.

title: Register New Cattle Purchase
description: Ensure that a cattle purchase can be registered with valid vendor, payer account, total animals, weight, price per kg, and total amount.

steps.description: Navigate to cattle purchase registration page.
Fill in valid details including vendor ID, payer account ID, total animals, total weight, price per kg, and total amount.
Submit the purchase.
Verify the cattle purchase is recorded correctly and listed in purchase history.

title: Prevent Cattle Purchase with Negative Numbers
description: Verify that negative values in total animals, total weight, price per kg, or total amount are rejected with validation errors.

steps.description: Navigate to cattle purchase registration page.
Enter negative values in numeric fields.
Attempt to submit the purchase.
Verify validation errors are shown and purchase is not accepted.

title: Record a New Expense
description: Verify that financial officers can record a new expense with category, description, total amount, and due date.

steps.description: Navigate to the financial expense entry page.
Fill in a valid category, description, positive total amount, and future due date.
Submit the expense form.
Verify the new expense is saved and listed correctly.

title: Record Revenue Entry
description: Verify that users can record new revenues and the data is accurately stored and reflected in cash flow.

steps.description: Navigate to revenue recording page.
Enter valid revenue details.
Submit the revenue data.
Verify revenue is recorded and appears in financial reports and cash flow.

title: Create New Pen and Validate Capacity
description: Verify infrastructure managers can create pens with capacity limits and the system enforces capacity when allocating animals.

steps.description: Navigate to pens management page.
Create a new pen with a specified capacity.
Verify the pen is created successfully.
Attempt to allocate animals exceeding the pen capacity.
Verify the system prevents allocations beyond capacity and shows an appropriate error.

title: Schedule Farm Activity with Reminder
description: Verify that users can create calendar events for farm activities with scheduled reminders and that the reminders trigger correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to calendar events page.
Create a new event with all required details and set a reminder.
Save the event.
Verify the event appears in calendar and the reminder notification is triggered as scheduled.

title: Record Veterinary Intervention
description: Verify that veterinarians can log new health interventions, including vaccinations and medications, and that the entries are stored properly.

steps.description: Navigate to interventions management page.
Enter complete details of a new veterinary intervention.
Submit the intervention record.
Verify the new intervention is listed and associated with correct cattle lots.

title: Access Financial Analytics Dashboard
description: Verify that users can access and view financial analytics and reports with correct data summaries and visualizations.

steps.description: Navigate to the financial analytics dashboard.
Verify the dashboard loads within 2 seconds.
Verify financial summaries, charts, and reports display accurate data.

title: Secure API Access Requires Valid JWT
description: Verify that API endpoints are secured and reject requests without a valid JWT token.

steps.description: Send API request to a protected endpoint without JWT token.
Verify the request is denied with an unauthorized error.
Send API request with expired or invalid JWT token.
Verify the request is denied and appropriate error is returned.

title: Data Encryption Verification
description: Verify that sensitive data fields are stored encrypted and cannot be retrieved in plaintext via APIs or UI.

steps.description: Create or retrieve records containing sensitive data.
Verify stored data is encrypted in the database.
Verify that the frontend and APIs do not expose sensitive data unencrypted.

title: System Health Check Endpoint
description: Verify that the health check API endpoint returns the system and database status successfully.

steps.description: Send a GET request to the /health endpoint.
Verify the response indicates the system is healthy and database connection is active.

title: API Response Time Within Target
description: Verify that all API responses for core features respond within 500ms under normal load conditions.

steps.description: Send requests to key API endpoints such as authentication, purchases, sales, and financial records.
Verify each API response time is less than 500 milliseconds.

title: UI Load Time Within Target
description: Verify that key UI pages load completely within 2 seconds on supported browsers and devices.

steps.description: Navigate to major UI pages like dashboard, cattle lot management, financial center, sales pipeline.
Verify each page fully loads within 2 seconds.

title: Test Data Cleanup Endpoint
description: Verify the test data API correctly cleans up all test data when triggered, ensuring no residual test records remain.

steps.description: Create test data using test data API endpoints.
Send DELETE request to /api/v1/test-data/cleanup.
Verify all test data records are deleted from the system.

title: Sales Kanban Board Functionality
description: Verify that sales teams can manage sales records via Kanban board with drag-and-drop between stages and that changes persist.

steps.description: Navigate to the sales pipeline Kanban board.
Create a new sale record.
Drag the sale record between different stages.
Verify the changes are saved and reflected on refresh.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users can only access features and data according to their role permissions.

steps.description: Login with a user having limited role permissions.
Attempt to access restricted modules or actions.
Verify access is denied or UI elements are hidden for unauthorized features.
